evidence.source_document: Complaint - Class Action for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief
evidence.text: Plaintiffs thus seek declaratory and injunctive relief to enjoin this unlawful implementation of the SIJS statute and agency action that runs contrary to the Administrative Procedure Act (APA).
